_desc.NAICS_DESCRIPTION: All Other Miscellaneous Chemical Product and Preparation Manufacturing

_exec_summary.SummaryText:
Capital Resin Corporation (CRC) believes in a proactive, integrated approach to Accidental Release Prevention. Our program integrates ongoing upgrades in periodic maintenance scheduling, ISO documentation, and Process Safety Management.

CRC personnel receive initial training in emergency response plans and policy during new employee orientation, and hands on training annually. Contracts are in place with local response companies to insure immediate service should contingencies occur that exceeds the capabilities of CRC equipment and personnel.

CRC processes covered by the Risk Management program include our formaldehyde manufacturing plant and associated storage tanks and load racks. The regulated substance (per 68.130) is formaldehyde solution (CAS 50-00-0). As the attached Risk Management Plan details, our worse case scenario involved the complete failure of one of the storage tanks.  While the chances of this occurring are extremely unlikely, analysis of this scenario was required under the RMP rule. Any leak or failure in the formaldehyde storage system would be contained by the dike system around the tanks.

Accidental Release Prevention is integrated with all aspects of CRC operations. Process safety information contained in each Formaldehyde Operators Manual and MSDS data. Training provides intensive hands-on knowledge of the production process. CRC documents training on each of the required areas. Written operating procedures are documented and controlled through CRC ISO 9001 program. Operating Procedures are reviewed and a written test is administered in the formal training sessions.

Each employee involved in operating Formaldehyde Plant, Tanks, or Load rack is trained in an overview of the process and familiarization with the operating procedures described previously. The training emphasizes safe operation of the plant and associated systems.  Several weeks of on the job training emphasizes job tasks, safety and health hazards, normal and emergency oper

ations, and safe work practices. 

CRC controls and tracks periodic maintenance requirements and insures mechanical integrity of its processes. Under this program, we perform representative sampling and inspection of formaldehyde tank structure for corrosion and integrity. CRC has  Management of Change and Pre-Start-up Review programs implemented under PSM and administered for this  process.
